mapper.insert: insert into TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease (ExtendCorrectionerID, CertifID, InfectedWayTypeValue, IsCrime, CrimeInf, CaseType, AIDSAttentionTypeValue, HelpingInf, HelperName, HelperContact, DrugReasonTypeValue, DrugResultTypeValue, AIDSReceiveCTypeValue, ReceiveCOrganization ) values (#{extendCorrectionerID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{certifID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{infectedWayTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isCrime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crimeInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{AIDSAttentionTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{helpingInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{helperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{helperContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugReasonTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{drugResultTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{AIDSReceiveCTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{receiveCOrganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease set CertifID = #{certifID,jdbcType=CHAR}, InfectedWayTypeValue = #{infectedWayTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, IsCrime = #{isCrime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CrimeInf = #{crimeInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CaseType = #{caseType,jdbcType=CHAR}, AIDSAttentionTypeValue = #{AIDSAttentionTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, HelpingInf = #{helpingInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HelperName = #{helperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HelperContact = #{helperContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DrugReasonTypeValue = #{drugReasonTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, DrugResultTypeValue = #{drugResultTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, AIDSReceiveCTypeValue = #{AIDSReceiveCTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, ReceiveCOrganization = #{receiveCOrganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ExtendCorrectionerID = #{extendCorrectionerID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ExtendCorrectionerID, CertifID, InfectedWayTypeValue, IsCrime, CrimeInf, CaseType, AIDSAttentionTypeValue, HelpingInf, HelperName, HelperContact, DrugReasonTypeValue, DrugResultTypeValue, AIDSReceiveCTypeValue, ReceiveCOrganization from TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease where ExtendCorrectionerID = #{extendCorrectionerID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ExtendCorrectionerID, CertifID, InfectedWayTypeValue, IsCrime, CrimeInf, CaseType, AIDSAttentionTypeValue, HelpingInf, HelperName, HelperContact, DrugReasonTypeValue, DrugResultTypeValue, AIDSReceiveCTypeValue, ReceiveCOrganization from TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease where CertifID = #{certifID}

select ExtendCorrectionerID, CertifID, InfectedWayTypeValue, IsCrime, CrimeInf, CaseType, AIDSAttentionTypeValue, HelpingInf, HelperName, HelperContact, DrugReasonTypeValue, DrugResultTypeValue, AIDSReceiveCTypeValue, ReceiveCOrganization from TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease

select count(*) from TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease left join TEServedPersonBasic on TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease.CertifID=TEServedPersonBasic.CertifID where 1=1
and TEServedPersonBasic.NetGridID= #{netGridID}

SELECT t1.ExtendCorrectionerID,t1.CertifID,t2.InfectedWayTypeName,t1.IsCrime,t1.CrimeInf,t3.CaseTypeName,t4.AIDSAttentionTypeName, t1.HelpingInf,t1.HelperName,t1.HelperContact,t5.DrugReasonTypeName,t6.DrugResultTypeName,t7.AIDSReceiveCTypeName, t1.ReceiveCOrganization,t10.Longitude,t10.Latitude FROM TESpecialPopulationExtendAIDSdisease t1 left join TECODEInfectedWayType t2 on t1.InfectedWayTypeValue=t2.InfectedWayTypeValue left join TECODECaseType t3 on t1.CaseType=t3.CaseTypeValue left join TECODEAIDSAttentionType t4 on t1.AIDSAttentionTypeValue=t4.AIDSAttentionTypeValue left join TECODEDrugReasonType t5 on t1.DrugReasonTypeValue=t5.DrugReasonTypeValue left join TECODEDrugResultType t6 on t1.DrugResultTypeValue=t6.DrugResultTypeValue left join TECODEAIDSReceiveCType t7 on t1.AIDSReceiveCTypeValue=t7.AIDSReceiveCTypeValue left join TEServedPersonBasic t8 on t1.CertifID=t8.CertifID left join TRPersonHouse t9 on t8.ServedPersonID=t9.ServedPersonID left join TEHouse t10 on t9.HouseID=t10.HouseID where 1=1
and t8.NetGridID= #{netGridID}
